name: Urdu-latex
tagline: Demonstrates how to typeset urdu (both prose and poetry) in LaTeX
body:
### Type-setting Urdu using LaTeX

Welcome to the exciting world of type-setting Urdu literature in LaTeX. Once you have mastered this technique there will be no going back.

Head over to the [urdu-latex](https://github.com/abid-mujtaba/urdu-latex/) github page to learn how to type-set both urdu prose and, more importantly, urdu poetry using LaTeX.

You can find samples at:

[nasr (prose)](http://abid-mujtaba.github.io/urdu-latex/docs/nasr.pdf)

[nazm (poetry)](http://abid-mujtaba.github.io/urdu-latex/docs/nazm.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
